# Tooltip
```import { Tooltip, TooltipContent, TooltipTarget } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Atom";```

Tooltip has a sub component; `TooltipContent` and `TooltipTarget`. <br/> 
As the name you can put some information inside `TooltipContent`, and put your component target inside `TooltipTarget`

</Preview>

Theres two type of Tooltips; click and hover
